title: Artificial Intelligence
description: This course will introduce you to the fundamental concepts of Artificial Intelligence (AI) and its applications, equipping you with the knowledge to understand and engage with AI technologies.
body: This course will introduce you to the fundamental concepts of Artificial Intelligence (AI) and its applications, equipping you with the knowledge to understand and engage with AI technologies.
instruction: To get started, select the modules below.

_buttons.disabledAriaLabel: This button is disabled at the moment

_bookmarking.resumeButtonAriaLabel: Navigate to your furthest point of progress.

_pageLevelProgress.pageLevelProgress: List of page sections and completion status. Select incomplete sections to jump directly to the content.

_trickle.incompleteContent: There is incomplete content above. You must complete this before you can proceed through the course.

_cards.ariaRegion: Cards. Select open button to expand the content.

_accordion.ariaRegion: List of expandable sections. Select each button to expand the content.

_graphic.scrollAriaLabel: Use the scrollbar to pan the image left and right. {{#if _graphic.alt}}{{_graphic.alt}}{{/if}}

_hotgraphic.ariaRegion: Image with selectable areas. Select each button to show more information.

_matching.ariaRegion: Matching. Select from lists and then submit.
_matching.ariaUserAnswer: The answer you chose for {{{itemText}}} was {{{userAnswer}}}

_media.allyVolumeControlText: Use Up/Down Arrow keys to increase or decrease volume.
_media.progessHelpText: Use Left/Right Arrow keys to advance one second, Up/Down arrows to advance ten seconds.

_narrative.ariaRegion: Slide show. Select the next button to progress.

_slider.ariaRegion: Slider. Respond to the question by selecting a value on the scale and then submit.
_slider.ariaCorrectAnswerRange: The correct answer is any value from {{{bottom}}} to {{{top}}}

_textinput.ariaRegion: Text input. Type your answer and then submit.

_flowItems.ariaRegion: This component is an flow items.

_sliderItems.ariaRegion: This component is an slider items.

_tabs.ariaRegion: A tabbed content container. Content can be text, graphic or both.

_verticalItems.ariaRegion: This component is an vertical items.

_resources.title: Resources
_resources.description: View resources for this course by clicking here.

_resourcesItems.title: Vanilla Theme Swatch
_resourcesItems.description: See the swatch for the vanilla theme by clicking here.

_resourcesItems.title: Adapt Learning YouTube Channel
_resourcesItems.description: Fancy catching up on some Adapt material? Click here.

_resourcesItems.title: Adapt Project Site
_resourcesItems.description: View the project's web site by clicking here.

_resourcesItems.title: Framework chat
_resourcesItems.description: Join the framework chat room by clicking here.

_bookmarking.title: Resume?
_bookmarking.body: Would you like to resume the course from the location you were at last time?

_notifyOnComplete.title: Course Complete
_notifyOnComplete.body: Well done, {{_globals._learnerInfo.firstname}}! You have completed the course and may now close this window.
